title: Rubio Reintroduces Bipartisan TikTok Ban, Says ‘Momentum Is Growing’ to Pass Bill
description: Sen. Marco Rubio (R-FL) reintroduced a bill with Sen. Angus King (I-ME) on Friday to ban TikTok unless the app is fully divested of Chinese ownership, announcing that “momentum is growing” to pass the legislation.
author: Ashley Oliver, Ashley Oliver

title: Senators form bipartisan Colorado River caucus as tensions rise in West over water crisis
description: As the Colorado River sinks further into crisis, senators from seven states are formalizing a group to examine how Washington can help ease the pain.
author: Ella Nilsen

title: Sen. Josh Hawley proposes legal age to allow kids on social media
description: Sen. Josh Hawley is calling for a ban on social media use for Americans under 16 years old, arguing that companies' predatory social media platforms harm kids.
author: Anders Hagstrom

title: Don't look up: The bigger China threat worrying lawmakers is in the palm of your hand, not the sky
description: Lawmakers are searching for ways to limit the risks from TikTok, owned by a Chinese conglomerate with ties to the CCP, as tensions with China increases.
author: Chad Pergram

title: Sen. Josh Hawley wants to create a legal age to be allowed on social media
description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., is pushing a legislative package aimed at protecting children online — including setting the minimum age to be on social media at 16.
author: Allan Smith

title: Can GOP's Culture War Gamble Help it Win in 2024?
description: Republicans are doubling down on the culture wars ahead of 2024 presidential primaries in the hope an "anti-woke" message will resonate in mainstream America.
author: Paul Bond
